headline.main: CONGRESS 'ASSAULT' BY NAZIS CHARGED; Senator Lee Says Propaganda Drive Seeks to Delay Lease-Lend Bill Fatally PLEADS FOR SPEEDY HELP Terms England Only Barrier Between U.S. and 'Greatest Flood of War'

lead_paragraph: Declaring that England is the only barrier between America and "the greatest flood of war ever gathered together," United States Senator Josh Lee of Oklahoma asserted yesterday that "the United States Congress is today being assaulted by the greatest campaign of Nazi propaganda which has yet been unleashed" to stop the Lease-Lend Bill, weaken it by amendments or delay it until too late.
abstract: Ss on Nazi propaganda sent Cong, Natl Dem Club
